title: Major countries in lithium mine production 2014 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Australia had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.
In Country Australia, 2016 had the maximum Production in metric tons and it saw the lowest in Country Namibia out of all 8 Countrys.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2016 that was found in Country Australia was 14300.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Namibia.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Countrys on X-axis for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Country Australia had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Australia, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 58800.0 among the 4 groups and in Namibia, 2014 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, 2016 had the highest Production in metric tons in Country Australia and lowest Production in metric tons in Country Namibia.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2016 that was found in Country Australia was 14300.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Namibia.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Production in metric tons was found in case of 2018.

In Country Australia, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 58800.0 among the 4 groups and in Namibia, 2014 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0. The second highest Production in metric tons 14300.0 was observed for 2018 in Country Australia.
On average, the Country Australia had the highest Production in metric tons for all 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Namibia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
